page.title: 02HOUSING IN ROYTON
page.content: HOUSING IN ROYTON IS MAINLY TERRACED, SEMI-DETACHED, FLATS OR MAISONETTES. THERE ARE MORE TERRACED HOUSES BECAUSE IN THE OLDEN DAYS THEY WERE BUILT FOR THE MILL WORKERS TO LIVE IN. MAISONETTES WERE BUILT LATER BECAUSE THEY TOOK UP LESS SPACE THAN TERRACED HOUSES. SEMI-DETACHED MEANS TWO HOUSES JOINED TOGETHER. THEY NORMALLY HAVE QUITE BIG GARDENS. FLATS ARE BUILT ON TOP OF ONE ANOTHER TO SAVE SPACE. THE HIGHER THEY ARE THE MORE ROOM THEY SAVE. THERE ARE TWO TYPES OF MAISONETTES. ONE OF THEM IS A HOUSE AT THE BOTTOM AND A FLAT AT THE TOP. THE OTHER IS THE OTHER WAY ROUND.
